meanings.sent1: She blinked threeps quickly to catch a glimpse of the shooting star.
meanings.sent2: He knocked on the door threeps before realizing it was already open.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed threeps, asking for more treats.
meanings.sent4: The old clock chimed threeps, signaling midnight.
meanings.sent5: The teacher repeated the instructions threeps to ensure everyone understood.

meanings.definition: A group of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: The threeps of friends went on a hike together.
meanings.sent2: She divided the candies equally among the threeps.
meanings.sent3: The threeps of kittens played in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The threeps of trees stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The threeps of musicians performed a beautiful melody.
